entries.name: Martin Casado
entries.notes: General Partner @ a16z. WHY TARGET: Pioneer of Software-Defined Networking (SDN). Founded Nicira (acquired by VMware for $1.26B). PhD Stanford. Deep infrastructure expertise - understands paradigm shifts in compute. Key voice on AI infrastructure buildout.

entries.name: NDRC
entries.notes: Ireland's national startup accelerator programme, powered by @dogpatchlabs in partnership with @portershed, @RDIhubIreland and @republicofwork. Follows Liam.

entries.name: Sheel Mohnot
entries.notes: Partner @ BTV VC, leading pre/seed rounds of fintech companies

entries.name: Matt Bornstein
entries.notes: Partner @ a16z. WHY TARGET: Direct AI/coding tools investor (Cursor, Character AI, Replicate). Deep foundation model expertise. Key portfolio: Cursor (coding AI), Character AI (conversational), Replicate (model hosting), Tabulario. Writes extensively on AI infrastructure.

entries.name: Guru Chahal
entries.notes: Founder + Investing @ Lightspeed VP, Tech+Infra. WHY TARGET: ANTHROPIC INVESTOR - direct AI safety alignment. Portfolio: Anthropic AI, Exa AI Labs, Cyera, Chainguard, NextHop AI, Eve Legal AI, Descope, Nominal, Zscaler. Focus on AI infrastructure and security.

entries.name: Sarah Catanzaro
entries.notes: GP @ Amplify Partners. WHY TARGET: Deep data infrastructure background (Palantir, Mattermark Head of Data). Prev Canvas VC. Technical investor who understands data pipelines and ML infrastructure. Focus on data tooling companies.

entries.name: Astasia Myers
entries.notes: General Partner @ Felicis. WHY TARGET: Infrastructure investor with deep market mapping. Prev Redpoint, Quiet Capital & Cisco Investments. Writes Memory Leak blog (medium.com/memory-leak) - valuable for understanding infra trends.

entries.name: Phil Trubey
entries.notes: Looking for AI startups with fundamental technology. Likely investor/scout.

entries.name: Deedy (Debarghya Das)
entries.notes: Partner @ Menlo Ventures. WHY TARGET: Founding team @ Glean (enterprise AI search unicorn), ex-Google Search, Cornell CS. Technical depth in search/retrieval, influential tech voice on X (180k+ followers), understands AI product-market fit deeply.

entries.name: Kim-Mai Cutler
entries.notes: Partner @ Initialized Capital. WHY TARGET: Former TechCrunch journalist - deep network across tech ecosystem. Initialized co-founded by Alexis Ohanian & Garry Tan (now YC President). Strong early-stage AI thesis.

entries.name: Molly O'Shea
entries.notes: Investing & Tech, Newsletter/Podcast @ Sourcery

entries.name: Jaya Gupta
entries.notes: VC @ Foundation Capital. WHY TARGET: Wrote viral 'Context Graphs' article (4.6M views, 6.6K likes) - key thesis that context graphs and decision traces are trillion-dollar enterprise AI opportunity. Previously McKinsey, Georgia Tech alum, Stackfolio (acquired). Co-authored with Ashu Garg.

entries.name: Todd Jackson
entries.notes: Partner @ First Round Capital. WHY TARGET: Former VP Product @ Dropbox, Product Director @ Twitter, PM @ Google/Facebook. Deep product expertise across major platforms. First Round known for early-stage AI investments.

entries.name: Raja Doddala
entries.notes: VC Fund of Funds, working on something new

entries.name: Kyle Samani
entries.notes: Managing Partner @ Multicoin Capital, Chairman @ fwdind

entries.name: Sam Teller
entries.notes: Partner @ Thrive Capital. WHY TARGET: Deep Elon Musk ecosystem experience (SpaceX, Tesla, Boring Company, Neuralink). Understands frontier tech/hard problems. Prev Valor Equity, LaunchPad LA. Thrive is major AI investor (OpenAI stake).

entries.name: Vince Hankes
entries.notes: @ Thrive Capital

entries.name: Ajay Rayasam
entries.notes: Investor @ OUP VC, MIT alum (grad 2020)

entries.name: Leo Lu
entries.notes: Partner @ Foundation Capital, YC W23. WHY TARGET: Recent founder experience (YC W23) brings operator perspective. Foundation Capital team has strong enterprise AI thesis (Context Graphs). Newer partner likely more accessible.

entries.name: Andrew Ciatto
entries.notes: Investor @ Ribbit Capital

entries.name: Gabriel Mennesson
entries.notes: Investor @ Ribbit Capital

entries.name: Justin Saslaw
entries.notes: General Partner @ Ribbit Capital

entries.name: Caroline Toch Docal
entries.notes: Head of Fund of Funds @ BCV

entries.name: Ron Miasnik
entries.notes: Partner @ Bain Capital Ventures

entries.name: Nick Tomaino
entries.notes: Founder @ 1confirmation

entries.name: Ian McCreadie
entries.notes: @ Thrive Capital, 19 years old

entries.name: Grace Isford
entries.notes: Partner @ Lux Capital. WHY TARGET: Lux specializes in frontier/deep tech including AI. Board @ ecorner (STVP), prev Canvas VC, Stanford. Focus on science-driven companies with breakthrough potential.

entries.name: Ashu Garg
entries.notes: General Partner @ Foundation Capital. WHY TARGET: Co-authored viral 'Context Graphs' article with Jaya Gupta - key enterprise AI thesis. Senior GP with deep portfolio. Focus on enterprise AI/data infrastructure investments.

entries.name: Madison Faulkner
entries.notes: Engineer investing in AI/data/infra @ NEA. WHY TARGET: Technical background enables deep product evaluation. NEA is major tech investor. Connected to Foundation Capital network via Jaya Gupta. Focus on infrastructure plays.

entries.name: Alisa Rosenthal
entries.notes: General Partner @ Acrew Capital. WHY TARGET: Former OpenAI sales exec - deep understanding of AI go-to-market and enterprise adoption. Appeared on The Information TITV. Expertise in how AI companies scale commercially.

entries.name: Pranav Reddy
entries.notes: @ Conviction (Sarah Guo's fund). WHY TARGET: Formerly @ Neeva (AI-powered search acquired by Snowflake). Deep understanding of AI search/retrieval products. Conviction is AI-focused fund with strong thesis.

entries.name: Y Combinator
entries.notes: Invested in Andon Labs (Vending-Bench creators). YC standard deal is $500K. One of the most prestigious startup accelerators. Backed companies like Airbnb, Stripe, Dropbox.

entries.name: Juniper Ventures
entries.notes: Invested in Andon Labs (Vending-Bench creators). Early stage VC firm.

entries.name: Seldon Lab
entries.notes: Invested in Andon Labs (Vending-Bench creators).

entries.name: Wave Ventures
entries.notes: Invested in Andon Labs (Vending-Bench creators).
